none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on March 25, 2019 Description from Terminal Escape:
This band is simply brilliant, and I should just stop there and (strongly) suggest that you listen. However, I will add that their approach to Eastern European punk is cold, relentless and deadly; their presentation is cold, deadly and relentless; they will make you want to break everything. Polish ex-pats making life in Dublin...this is their second tape, and it's offered here with the highest recommendation.  SESJA 2

seo.title: ŻONA ZŁA - Sesja 2 - Terminal Escape
